response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, but we believe its true worth extends far beyond its monetary value. We are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $750,000, a generous discount reflecting our confidence in its ability to surpass your expectations. We understand that its value to you may be unique and not quantifiable in dollars alone. Let's discuss how this product could enhance your life or business and create a mutually beneficial arrangement. Looking forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 750000}
